metadata.title: CVE-2016-8286 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.7.14 and earlier allows remoteauthenticated users to affect confidentiality via vectors related toServer: Security: Privileges.

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
